name: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: A pirate adventure story about Monkey D. Luffy and his crew, the Straw Hat Pirates

name: Naruto
author: Masashi Kishimoto
description: A ninja story about Naruto Uzumaki and his quest to become the Hokage

name: Bleach
author: Tite Kubo
description: A story about a teenager who gains the power to see ghosts and becomes a Soul Reaper

name: Hunter x Hunter
author: Yoshihiro Togashi
description: A story about a young boy who becomes a Hunter, a member of society's elite who possess exceptional abilities

name: Fairy Tail
author: Hiro Mashima
description: A story about a young wizard and her friends in the Fairy Tail guild
